<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>x_1896436_bot_ap_0.Save people spouse history (old name)</api_name><batch_exclude>false</batch_exclude><description>Processes a list of people spouse history records (Insert, Update, Delete)</description><mutates_server_data>true</mutates_server_data><name>Save people spouse history (old name)</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
  {
    "name": "items",
    "label": "List Items",
    "description": "JSON array of objects",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "json",
    "required": true
  },
  {
    "name": "peopleSpouseSysId",
    "label": "People spouse sysId",
    "description": "People spouse sysId",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "string",
    "required": true
  }
]</props><required_translations/><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
	gs.info("[Save people spouse history] : " + JSON.stringify(input));
    var items = input.items;
	var peopleSpouseSysId = input.peopleSpouseSysId;
    var response = {
        success: true,
    };

    if (!items || !Array.isArray(items)) {
        return {
            success: false,
            error: "Invalid input"
        };
    }

    items.forEach(function(item) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1896436_bot_ap_0_people_spouse_history');

        if (item.operation === 'insert') {
            gr.initialize();
            gr.setValue('title_name', item.title_name.value || '');
            gr.setValue('first_name_th', item.first_name_th.value || '');
            gr.setValue('first_name_en', item.first_name_en.value || '');
			gr.setValue('last_name_th', item.last_name_th.value || '');
            gr.setValue('last_name_en', item.last_name_en.value || '');
			gr.setValue('people_spouse_id', peopleSpouseSysId || '');
            gr.insert();
        } else if (item.operation === 'update') {
            if (gr.get(item._row_data.uniqueValue)) {
				gr.setValue('title_name', item.title_name.value || '');
				gr.setValue('first_name_th', item.first_name_th.value || '');
				gr.setValue('first_name_en', item.first_name_en.value || '');
				gr.setValue('last_name_th', item.last_name_th.value || '');
				gr.setValue('last_name_en', item.last_name_en.value || '');
				gr.setValue('people_spouse_id', peopleSpouseSysId || '');
                gr.update();
            }
        } else if (item.operation === 'delete') {
            if (gr.get(item._row_data.uniqueValue)) {
                gr.deleteRecord();
            }
        }
    });

    return response;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-19 10:49:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>21ce3e993beeb250bc1ccdd643e45aac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Save people spouse history (old name)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform_21ce3e993beeb250bc1ccdd643e45aac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-19 13:09:51</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=21ce3e993beeb250bc1ccdd643e45aac"/></record_update>
